rdf:Description.dc:title: Provincial report : grade 6 science achievement testing program : December 1982 1982 December 1982.
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Alberta Education.
rdf:Description.dc:description: Presents the results of the Grade 6 science achievement test administered June 8, 1982. Contains a brief description of the Grade 6 science program and test.
